title: Luísa Dias Diogo | Big Win Philanthropy

quotes: Diogo was Prime Minister of Mozambique from 2004 to 2010 and was the country's first female Prime Minister.
Before becoming Prime Minister, she served as Minister of Planning and Finance for five years.
During her professional career Diogo was recognized by Time Magazine in 2004 as one of the hundred most influential people in the world
